item.description: Following the Darwin Day lectures at the Humanist Chaplaincy at Harvard, join us for drinks and mingling as we celebrate the discoveries and life of Darwin. Refreshments are on us, so come early! Celebrated around the world, Darwin Day is a new holiday available to people of all cultures, religions, and backgrounds united by our celebration of science and enlightenment. It seeks to acknowledge our global diversity, while celebrating our common humanity.
item.name: Darwin Day 2012: Drinks at Daedalus!
